summary: Frontend testing completed for Interactive Demo Page click functionality. All interactive elements (project cards, stats cards, form cards, submission rows, team member cards) are clickable and open detail modals correctly. Modals can be closed via overlay click. The interactive demo uses hardcoded sample data (MOCKED).
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing (project-card-proj-1, form-card-form-1, submission-row-sub-1, team-member-1, etc.)
DetailModal component has proper close functionality via overlay click and X button
seed_data_creation: None - Uses hardcoded SAMPLE_PROJECTS, SAMPLE_FORMS, SAMPLE_SUBMISSIONS, SAMPLE_TEAM data in InteractiveDemoPage.jsx
context_for_next_testing_agent: Interactive Demo at /demo/sandbox fully tested. All clickable elements work: Project cards open ProjectDetail modal, Form cards open FormDetail modal, Submission rows open SubmissionDetail modal, Team member cards open TeamMemberDetail modal. Stats cards navigate to appropriate tabs (Submissions, Team). Modals close via overlay click.
tests_passed: Project card proj-1 (Kenya Health Survey 2026) - opens Project Details modal
Project card proj-2 (Agricultural Census) - opens Project Details modal
Project card proj-3 (School Enrollment) - opens Project Details modal
Stats card 'Total Submissions' - navigates to Submissions tab
Stats card 'Active Enumerators' - navigates to Team tab
Stats card 'Validated' - navigates to Submissions tab
Stats card 'Pending Review' - navigates to Submissions tab
Form card form-1 (Household Health Assessment) - opens Form Details modal with questions list

Submission row sub-1 - opens Submission Details modal with validated status
Submission row sub-2 - opens Submission Details modal with pending status
Submission row sub-4 - opens Submission Details modal with flagged status
Team member 1 (Jane Wanjiku) - opens Team Member modal with profile details
Team member 2 (John Ochieng) - opens Team Member modal
Team member 3 (Mary Chebet - Supervisor) - opens Team Member modal
Modal close via overlay click - works correctly
Modal close via X button - works correctly

mocked_apis_list: All data in interactive demo is sample/hardcoded data in InteractiveDemoPage.jsx
